messages.message: cc @sean.donohoe unable to kubectl into aihub-prd like usual

I think there was a recent change to our cluster configs related to IP restrictions on the k8s API endpoints, but last I heard it had been rolled back :thinking_face: 

@Cody Boggs / @astpierre would either of you happen to know if this looks related?
I don’t know quite where the changes are, but i suspect the crafting egress IPs weren’t added to the allowlist :thinking_face:
I wouldn’t be shocked if those were missed either :melting_face: I’m looking for the incident now, but I could have swore I heard from several folks that the restrictions were rolled back
they were rolled back, but then rolled back back https://github.com/instabase/terraform-modules/pull/873
yeah we'll need to add the crafting egress bits here https://github.com/instabase/terraform-modules/pull/873/files#diff-013e387d9de7e213032100c42d403cccde524d24e1345776555c3efcee89258dR80

Sweet, I can get started on that in a couple minutes

Recording for my own notes, incident channel is at https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C08HJU5FRL7/p1742488535344089 (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C08HJU5FRL7/p1742488535344089)
<!subteam^S08AA13VAFQ> can I get a review on https://github.com/instabase/terraform-modules/pull/874 when someone has a moment?
Might wait til Monday to merge, just in case anything is wonky for some magical reason. lol
lol sure thing, thanks for the warning :)
